content: rse r e rse be rk b k @steph thestitchbish c y c y r r r r o t o t c s c h s e h e pe et ap t t a t disclaimer this pattern consist of colour block instructions and a graph provided in a separate pdf you are free to sell your finished product made from this pattern but do not sell this pattern as your own please credit me if sharing this pattern on social media @steph thestitchbitch and under #beserkcrochettapestry materials 3 5 mm crochet hook darning needle wooden dowel / tree branch scissors 8-ply /dk yarn in two colours i used hayfield bonus dk yarn blocking mat /steamer if you d like to achieve a straighter look dimensions - 7 25 inches w x 7 5 l skill level beginnner 4 colour block instructions each block refers to the colour of the stitches and the number of stitches you ll do per block rs refers to the right side the side on show and ws refers to the wrong side which is the back of the tapestry row 1 is your foundation chain of 33 loops and the rest of the pattern uses single_crochet you should be chaining 1 at the end of every row this turning chain counts as 1 stitch make sure each row includes 32 stitches checking regularly to make sure you have not dropped any stitches 4 colour block instructions 4 colour block instructions 4 graph 4 border single_crochet for one row around the panel with the 3 5 mm hook and black yarn to create a cleaner edge i hope you enjoyed this pattern please provide any feedback you have and feel free to tag me on instagram @steph thestitchbish with #berserkcrochettapestry if you d like to be featured ^ ^ thank you 4
